column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////one thing i've noticed about Chicago
column2: this city knows how to feed you in terms of quantity. expect large portions. finishing a pitcher of sangria never was quite the chore
column3: but in this case it seemed never ending. pintxo platters are great you get about six bit-size tapas- chorizo wrapped medjool date & manchego
column4: ahi tuna poached in olive oil on avocado toast
column8: artisanal spanish cheese & quince. patatas bravas & grilled squid were my absolute favorite. and for dessert
column14: spanish brownie- was a nice ending to our meal.
